graph_title: Total number of graduating students who start or continue as entrepreneurs
indicator_name: Total number of graduating students who start or continue as entrepreneurs
source_organisation_1: University of Applied Sciences Graduand placement questionnaire
SDG_GOAL: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
SDG_TARGET: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship
SDG_INDICATOR: Total number of graduating students who start or continue as entrepreneurs
DATA_COMP: Number of graduates who start or continue as entrepreneurs after one year of graduation
